brief: I have played video games since I was a kid. I learned almost everything by myself because it was a good challenge for my personal skills. I don ’t play a lot of different games but I am very passionate about my favorite ones. My games are always in English because I watched a lot of interviews, sneak peek and early access in English.

reflection.text: I am a big fan of the Sims 4. I use it to express my creativity through creations such as building or creating custom content.

I use a software called Sims Studio in order to download textures from the game. Then I use Photoshop to customize the texture like I want. Then I update my game ’ s files to change the texture. I am currently working on custom content which changes the material and the texture.

reflection2.text: In my last year in high school, we had to create a little game with the language Python. I worked with two other girls on “Escape Game ”. The player controls a student (top left image) and they have to escape high school with the exit door. But beware of the teachers ! I use a software called Sims Studio in order to download textures from the game. Then I use Photoshop to customize the texture like I want. Then I update my game’ s files to change the texture. I am currently working on custom content which changes the material and the texture.

I worked on the algorithm which creates patterns for the teachers, on the map and on the textures. It was a little bit difficult to make the whole code useful and efficient. For example, there is no duplicated code, only loops. And variables.
For the textures, I used the website Pixel to create pixel art. That is the reason why the quality is not great : the resolution was very low.
